SEC. 3. AMENDMENTS TO APPROPRIATIONS BILL. Section 302 of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 is amended to allow floor amendments to appropriations bills that reduce budget authority and relevant subcommittee allocations, as well as discretionary spending limits for the fiscal year covered by the bill and the following four fiscal years.
